page.title: 06COMMUNICATIONS HOLBEACH DR.
page.content:
LOCAL NEWS TRAVELS FAST AS WITH MOST VILLAGES AS THERE IS A VERY GOOD COMMUNICATION BETWEEN RESIDENTS. THERE IS A LOCAL NEWS SHEET WHICH IS PUBLISHED AND SENT OUT BY THE VICAR OF WHAPLODE DROVE GIVING DETAILS OF BIRTHS DEATHS AND MARRIAGES LOCALLY AND GIVING DETAILS OF ANY EVENTS TAKING PLACE IN THE MONTH COMING. IT OBVIOUSLY GIVES DETAILS OF THE CHURCH AND CHAPEL SERVICES AND ANY FETES OR BAZAARS TO BE HELD. THIS LEAFLET IS DISTRIBUTED BY HAND.
THE LOCAL PAPERS IN THE AREA ARE THE GUARDIAN AND THE LINCOLNSHIRE FREE PRESS ISSUED ON FRIDAY AND TUESDAY RESPECTFULLY.
